title: [Massive] mCSCL-Based Educational Program for Emotional Regulation Support in Pre-Service Teacher Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Pre-service language educators creating collaborative learning environments that leverage mobile devices to recognize and share emotions

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can classify their emotional states into three or more categories using an emotion tracker app in an mCSCL environment.
Learners can practice empathic communication strategies in conflict situations at least twice through emotion-sharing activities with peers.
At the end of the curriculum, learners can create an emotion regulation plan through project-based assessment and incorporate peer feedback.

resources: Wearable Device for Physiological Signal Measurement (Optional)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
